overview:
Brady Akers is a highly skilled public relations professional with experience in corporate and agency settings on both traditional and online fronts, for clients in general and specialized fields.

Currently serving as Group Outreach Manager for ViewMyLife, a social network that integrates peopleâ€™s online life providing powerful communication, contact management and photo, video and blog sharing tools.

Experienced with internal communication, media relations, marketing, brand identity, strategic planning, research, group outreach, grassroots efforts and project managements. Bachelor of Arts from Ball State Unviersity in Public Relations - School of Journalism.
